name: Ol' Weed Fingers
description:
The Forest Guardian, known to the locals as Ol' Weed Fingers, is the last protector of the Primordial tree. Their life force is attached - bound together since the beginning of time. Should the tree fall, Ol' Weed Fingers will perish with it, along with the lush grass surrounding the tree

A nearby settlement has set out to bring down the tree in order to harvest it's power. How long can you protect it for?

Controls
Movement: WASD

Melee Attack: 1, (click to attack)

Trap Selection: 2,3,4 (Click to place)

(Game Creator 2)
